question_text:
Question 21 
 
  
 
 
[Data Structure (Tree)] 
 
In a B+ tree, the requirement of at least half-full (50%) node occupancy is relaxed for which one of the 
 
following cases ? 
 
(A) Only the root node 
(B) All leaf nodes 
 
(C) All internal nodes 
(D) Only the leftmost leaf node 
Ans. 
(A)
explanation_text:
Sol.
 
In a 
B
 

 tree at least half full (50%) node occupancy is relaxed only for the root node.
Hence, the correct option is (A).
